game.name: Moto X Madness
game.description:
Are you ready to be participating in an online FMX Motocross biking challenge? Moto X Madness Game could be a right choice for you. This awesome free online racing game includes four different disciplines. You would surely get a chance to use your strong driving skills when you play this hair-raising stunt biker game. Whether you are a newbie or an expert ? this fun-filled bike racing game has all the ingredients required to enjoy its every level.

Make fast times with flawless riding and flip through the air confidently to ensure your win at the end of each level in this fast-paced motocross racing game. The lesser mistakes you will do, the easier it will become for you to complete each course. Performing as many flips as you can or popping balloons is a key to claim for the victory. Do not forget to race against the time in this bike game. You can control your bike with the help of arrow keys.Â 

You are lucky enough to play the role of a rider and perform thrilling bike stunts in front of a huge number of cheerleaders and audiences. Good command over the flipping and technical run are required to help you get gold in all the four events of this popular flash game available for boys. The graphics of this classy bike game is extremely appreciating. The receiving of silver and gold medal at the end will depend on how quickly you complete the course. Get on this bike, take risks, perform stunts and massive flips and show the world that you are a professional bike racer!
